name: Chrono-Raccoon
description:
Steve the Raccoon was digging through his favorite trash can one night when he accidentally swallowed a time machine. Now Steve has the power to control all of time around him if he so pleases. Help Steve use his newfound power to do exactly was Raccoons do best... stealing!

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attack

F - Interact

Q - Throw objects

E - Reverse time

This game is a very rough prototype of a concept that I had of giving an animal the power of time travel. I made this game myself over a ten-week process for my college capstone. The game is riddled with bugs, but I hold it close to my heart for what I was able to accomplish with it in only ten weeks.
